text: Kim Hong-woo (Hangul: 김홍우; born November 11, 1985), better known by his stage name Reddy (Hangul: 레디), is a South Korean rapper and singer. He released his debut single, Capt. Reddy, on September 27, 2011. He has also appeared on Show Me the Money 5, Tribe of Hip Hop and High School Style Icon. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Album details ! scope="col" colspan="1" style="width:5em;" | Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Sales |- !
